extDescription.message: This extension allows you to select variants of A/B testing by the Google Optimize.

labelClear.message: Are you sure you want to clear all saved Experiences?

helpStep1.message: First, display the Google Optimize test page.

helpStep2.message: Next, open the "Details" tab on the the Google Optimize page displaying a experience.

helpStep3.message: The Google Optimize AB Selector parse the test configuration from this page. When the parsing is completed successfully, the Google Optimize AB Selector icon will display a "!" mark.

helpStep4.message: Click the Google Optimize AB Selector icon to display a parsed test configuration. Click a URL on the Editor Page to open a page where you are running a test.

helpStep5.message: You can change a pattern on the test page. Select a pattern you want to change and click the Apply button.

msgGoogleOptimizeNotActive.message: No running tests can be found on this page.

msgGoogleOptimizeNotSaved.message: Google Optimize experience settings not saved. Please visit Google Optimize and load the test settings.

msgPleasReadHelp.message: See the help for detailed instructions.

detectEnded.message: Detected the end of a test.

optionEnableNotification.message: Display a notification when an Experiment is detected.
